author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
When Trump vowed to enforce federal immigration laws, that meant the entire country, even places that vow to protect criminal aliens at the expense of Americans.

The DOJ has launched a lawsuit against the City of Los Angeles and Mayor Karen Bass, challenging the city’s sanctuary policies introduced after Trump’s reelection. The DOJ argues that such policies violate federal law and claims that the city’s refusal to work with immigration authorities has fueled lawlessness, including rioting, looting, and vandalism.


Today, the Department of Justice sued Los Angeles over its illegal “sanctuary city” policies. We will keep enforcing federal immigration law in Los Angeles, whether or not the city’s government or residents agree with it. And we will not tolerat
title: DOJ Sues Los Angeles Over Sanctuary City Policies

NEW: President Trump says he won't hesitate to arrest socialist Zohran Mamdani, says there is no place for "a communist in this country."

Reporter: Mamdani said he will defy ICE and will not allow ICE to arrest criminal aliens in New York City. Your message to Mamdani?

T
title: Donald Trump makes the consequences clear if Zohran Mamdani gets in the way of ICE

description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

It's unclear why New Yorkers are so often subjected to some of the most questionable forms of "art" ever created. But never underestimate the lengths to which some progressives will go to label something as artistic—even when it clearly isn't.

New York has just unveiled its worst statue yet — and if you thought that tall lady with an attitude was bad, this one completely blows it out of the water.

The statue, called the “Foot Fountain,” is a pink structure that barely resembles a foot at all.

New
title: New York debuts new "foot fountain" that squirts out of the tip and looks like a different body part than the foot
